import { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react"; import "react-responsive-carousel/lib/styles/carousel.min.css"; // requires a loader import { Carousel } from "react-responsive-carousel"; import "./home.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; export default function Home() { const [allproducts, setAllproducts] = useState([]); const allProducts = () => { axios({ method: "GET", withCredentials: true, url: "http://localhost:4000/api/allproducts", }) .then((res) => { console.log(res.data.row); setAllproducts(res.data.row); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); }; useEffect(() => { allProducts(); }, []); return ( <>
